application.name: Abraca
application.summary: A graphical interface for controlling XMMS2

description.p: Abraca is a client for the XMMS2 music player which is capable of working with large media libraries in a swift fashion. It strives to have a minimalistic interface while providing powerful features.
Some of the noteworthy features includes:

ul.li: Automatic discovery of local and remote XMMS2 servers
Collection pattern style exploration of the media library
Fullscreen view with cover art for use on large displays
